description.en: Booster will increase your basic power from minigames for 3 hours.
description.cn: Booster will increase your basic power from minigames for 3 hours.

description.en: Looks smaller, but how about the bonus %? Use it wisely, and your wallet will grow bigger!
description.cn: Looks smaller, but how about the bonus %? Use it wisely, and your wallet will grow bigger!

description.en: With "Bitly Juice" miner, every hash invokes with the mischievous spirit of Beetlejuice. Just say its name three times and watch as it unleashes a whirlwind of mining power, extracting crypto from the netherworld of digital assets with ghostly precision and a dash of chaos.

description.en: A true feast for the blockchain, this miner glides through blocks with effortless grace, gathering crypto riches like a bountiful harvest. It’s a celebration of abundance, where every moment is worth giving thanks

description.en: Fueled by ambition and late-night study snacks, this miner channels the spirit of Brazil’s future minds. Calm, clever, and relentless, it turns discipline into digital gold — because progress is a block-by-block pursuit.

description.en: Bursting with festive spirit, this miner dances through the blockchain like a June bonfire party. Warm, lively, and full of surprises, it turns every block into a colorful celebration of crypto rewards.
